unity.name: Mecha Bash Battle
unity.about: A game based around modular fighting robots made for the Game Design 2 class at Cogswell Polytechnical College.  Made in Unity and C# using the Invector Melee system.

unreal.name: Under Maintenence
unreal.about: This VR game was made for Stanford Childerens Hospital during Game Studio 1 at Cogswell Polytechnical College where the entire class worked on it together.
unreal.whatidid: I worked on it as an Engineer and I created most of the first Minigame and I worked on the movement and interaction systems.
